data.text:
Hmm... Let me see if I've got this straight... 
So she doesn't want you to help her with her training, right? 
...I assume there's a reason you wanted to help her?
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text: Hehe. The two of you are really close, so... Hmm... She's working really hard, and you want to be there for her. Does that sound about right?
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text:
Affirmative. But... Neo Universe is "4.2 light years" away. 
Even "PSYC" can't...
data.name: Neo Universe

data.text:
"Neutrino". 
『Nothing's wrong』.
data.name: Neo Universe

data.text:
Have you considered... Maybe Rob Roy really does want your 
help? It could be that she just doesn't know how to respond.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text:
Whenever you did something for Rob Roy, how did she react? 
Try and remember.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text: ――Rob Roy... Rob Roy's "signal" was...
data.name: Neo Universe

data.text: ......『Disoriented』...?
data.name: Neo Universe

data.text:
Zenno Rob Roy's responses included 『Thank you』and 
『your kindness』. "Aid" provided should have "matched" needs. 
But...
data.name: Neo Universe

data.text:
......The "signal" was entirely 『disoriented』. 
『Why』......?
data.name: Neo Universe

data.text:
She didn't know why you would go out of your way to help her, 
or why you were so concerned with her.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text:
So, as happy as she was to have your help, I think she felt a little 
bit guilty about the whole thing.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text:
Rob Roy's a real sweetheart. I could see a timid girl like her 
being reluctant to accept so much kindness.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text:
.......?? 
"Not knowing why" became『reluctance』...?
data.name: Neo Universe

data.text:
――I'm getting kinda hungry. You want a snack? 
It just so happens I've got a little something for us.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text:
Here. Roast yam, one of my favorites. 
I've only got the one, unfortunately... How about we go halfsies?
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text:
Just pulling your leg. 
I had some earlier, so you can have the whole thing.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text:
Neo Universe would prefer "HAF" over "HOL"―― 
.......
data.name: Neo Universe

data.text: Universe. ――You chose not to "tell" me something just now, didn't you?
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text: Are you sure you're okay with this? You can take the whole thing yourself, or split it with me... What do you really want to do?
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text:
Let me hear your thoughts. 
"Tell" me how you really feel.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text:
............"HAF"....... 
Neo Universe "seeks"『warmth』. 
"THRF"―― "Vector": ...
data.name: Neo Universe

data.text: "HAF", not "HOL"―― "Vector": 『Halfsies』.
data.name: Neo Universe

data.text: Heehee. Don't mind if I do!
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text:
――Warm and tasty. Something about splitting food with 
someone else makes it taste even better. 
It's nice, knowing we're sharing something between us.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text: ――! ......Sphira. Neo Universe "agrees".
data.name: Neo Universe

data.text:
Communicating with Rob Roy is the same way. 
...Don't give up on trying to "tell" her how you feel.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text:
『Telling』... 
Is "EXDFF" for Neo Universe...
data.name: Neo Universe

data.text: I'm guessing that means it's hard for you? ...But that yam was really good, right? And it's only because you did your best to "tell" me how you felt that both of us got to taste it.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text:
I know you love Rob Roy a whole lot, and you want to be there 
for her―― But I think she can only accept those feelings if you 
"tell" her about them.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text:
We talked about how we exchange gifts at the Moon Viewing 
Social, right? That's another way to "tell" how you feel――
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text: You're not the first to go through this. The circumstances were a little different, but I can remember another girl who had trouble telling her friend how she felt.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text:
She wanted to say things like "I'm rooting for you," or 
"You light up my life". Things she couldn't bring herself to 
say out loud, things she kept locked up in her heart――
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text:
So she borrowed a little confidence from the Social. 
...It may not have been perfect, but she tried her best to say 
everything she wanted to say, putting her feelings into her gift.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text:
As for her friend, well, she was a little shocked, sure, but more 
than anything, she was happy. ...Heehee. I remember her 
jumping up and down, wailing tears of joy.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text: If you tell Rob Roy how you feel, I'm sure she'll be just as happy.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text:
――Don't worry. 
It doesn't matter how hard it is to say, as long as you say it 
like you mean it. 'Kay?
data.name: Fuji Kiseki

data.text: MMM! Delicious!! It's even more delicious after a long training session!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle

data.text:
(...Uni-san has been acting strange lately. 
Perhaps I did something to offend her...)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

data.text:
(She's treated me so well, for so long, yet I haven't done a thing 
in return. I――)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

data.text:
(――when I first enrolled, I started working at the school library... 
And I've had her on my mind, ever since I first sat at the 
circulation desk.)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

data.text:
(A curious regular visitor. She had a peculiar air about her, 
and her nose was always in a book.)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

data.text:
(The books she checked out were as curious as her. Collections 
of space photography, grand fantasies set on a galactic scale, 
deeply complex texts on aerospace engineering...)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

data.text:
(――It was like peering into an undiscovered world, far beyond 
my imagination. Simply reading through her checkout history 
was enough to broaden my horizons.)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

data.text:
(How did the world look through her eyes? 
Just what sort of sights could she see?)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

data.text:
(――I wanted to know. 
To see the same brilliant world as her...)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

data.text:
E-excuse me...! 
You're Neo Universe-senpai, aren't you...?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

data.text:
(When I first called out to her, I tactlessly blurted out her name. 
And yet she was willing to teach me so many things―― 
To bring them into my life.)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

data.text:
(She's always given me so much. 
But what have I ever given in return...?)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

data.text: .....y .......Rob Roy.... What's wrong?
data.name: Taiki Shuttle

data.text: Do you have a tummyache? Or... Are ya sleepy? You were training very very hard, after all!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle

data.text:
Oh, sorry! No, I'm all right, I can finish eating! 
...........It's just, well. There's just something I'm worried about, 
I suppose.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

data.text: ...I was thinking, I still haven't given back to Uni-san at all. Despite everything she does for me...
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

data.text: Well... I know Universe's been real nice to you lately. But why're you so hung up on it?
data.name: Taiki Shuttle

data.text:
What? Umm... She's always doing so much for me, but I've never 
returned the favor, so I feel guilty...
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

data.text: Ohhh? Don't worry! If she does you a kindness, just say "Thank you" and it'll all be OK!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle

data.text: ――I'm always gettin' helped out!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle

data.text: Dober's got her head on straight, so she looks after me every day!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle

data.text:
I get homesick and cry a whole lot, but Hishiama-san's always 
there to make me feel better!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle

data.text: And I want to race with my friends a lot! Suzuka's always willing to go on a run!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle

data.text: My momma, my poppa, my neighbors, too. They all did a whole lot for me. And I've always given them a great big "Thank you" in return!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle

data.text: I never say "sorry" to a helping hand. I smile and say "Thank you", and they smile back!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle

data.text: I bet Universe'll smile too! All you need to do accept her kindness and say "Thank you"!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle

data.text: ―――Accept her kindness...
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

data.text: (――Have I truly been "accepting" Uni-san's kindness...?)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

title: I want to 『be there』 for you
